chainOfRules.humanReadableExplanation: Press {key_act} when you see a {a} {stimulus}. Then then press {key_act} for the next {n} {b} {stimuli}. Then press {key_act} when you see a {c} {stimulus} then the first {d} {stimuli}

once.humanReadableExplanation: Press {key_act} when you see a {a} {stimulus} once only

sequence of two.humanReadableExplanation: Press {key_act} when you see a {a} {stimulus}, followed immediately by a {b} {stimulus}

two identical.humanReadableExplanation: Press {key_act} when you see two {a} {stimuli}, one after another

double negation.humanReadableExplanation: Press {key_act} when you see any {stimulus} that is not {a} and not {b}

total negation.humanReadableExplanation: Press {key_act} when you see any {stimulus} that is not {a}, {b} or {c}

simple sequence.humanReadableExplanation: Press {key_act} when you see a sequence of three {stimuli} matching: {a}, {b}, {c}

branching.humanReadableExplanation: Start by taking a picture of each {a} {stimuli}. But if you see a {b} {stimuli}, photograph that {b} {stimulus}, and from then on, only photograph {b} {stimulus}.

complex branching.humanReadableExplanation: Press {key_act} for every {a} {stimuli} until you see a second {b} {stimuli}. Then press {key_act} every time you see a {c} {stimuli}

complexTarget.humanReadableExplanation: Press {key_act} when you see a {a} {stimuli} followed by any other {stimulus} except {a} and then a {b} {stimuli}. Repeat this {n} times

orTarget.humanReadableExplanation: Press {key_act} when you see a {a} {stimulus} or a {b} {stimulus} followed by any other {stimuli} except {a}. Repeat this {n} times

wildCardTarget.humanReadableExplanation: Press {key_act} when you see a {a} {stimulus} or a {b} {stimulus} followed by any other {stimuli}, and then any {stimuli} except {a}. Repeat this {n} times

ordinals.humanReadableExplanation: Make note of the first two {stimulus} colours you see. Press {key_act} whenever you see the first colour followed immediately by the second

ordinal branching.humanReadableExplanation: Skip the first {stimuli}. If the second {stimulus} colour you see is {a} then photograph every {b} {stimulus}. But if the second {stimulus} colour is not {a} then photograph every {c} {stimulus}

simple ordinal branching.humanReadableExplanation: If the first {stimulus} colour you see is {a} then photograph every {b} {stimulus}. But if the first {stimulus} colour is not {a} then photograph every {c} {stimulus}
If the first {stimulus} colour you see is {a} then photograph every {b} {stimulus}. But if the first {stimulus} colour is not {a} then photograph every {c} {stimulus}

modus ponens.humanReadableExplanation: If the first {stimulus} colour you see is {a} then photograph every {b} {stimulus}. But if the second {stimulus} colour is not {a} then photograph every {c} {stimulus}

sequence.humanReadableExplanation: If you see {a}, {b}, {c} {stimuli} one after another, photograph the {c} {stimulus}.

sequence with negation.humanReadableExplanation: Photograph any {stimulus} that comes after a {a} {stimulus}, unless it is {b}.

not first.humanReadableExplanation: Photograph all {stimuli} that are not the same colour as the first {stimulus} you see

rule shifting.humanReadableExplanation: Wait for the first {a} {stimulus}, then take a picture of it. Then wait for the first {b} {stimulus}, then take a picture of it. Alternate taking pictures of one {a} {stimulus} and one {b} {stimulus}.

branching logic complex.humanReadableExplanation: Take a picture of every {a} {stimulus}, until you see at least two {b} {stimuli} in a row. Then photograph every {c} {stimulus}, but not {a} {stimuli} anymore.

sequence.humanReadableExplanation: If you see {a}, {b}, {c} {stimuli} one after another, photograph the {c} {stimulus}.

stroop simple.humanReadableExplanation: Now you will see the colour written over the {stimuli}. Ignore the colour of the {stimuli}, and only react to the word. Photograph every time you see {a}

sequence of two snakes.humanReadableExplanation: Press {key_act} when you see a {a} {stimulus}, followed immediately by a {b} {stimulus}

branching snakes.humanReadableExplanation: Start by taking a picture of each {a} {stimuli}. But if you see a {b} {stimuli}, photograph that {b} {stimuli}, and from then on, only photograph {b} {stimulus}.

sequence facing right.humanReadableExplanation: Photograph if you see {a} {stimulus} {R} followed by a {b} {stimulus} facing any direction.

not and facing left.humanReadableExplanation: Photograph all {stimuli} which are not {a}, but are {L}.

first.humanReadableExplanation: Photograph the first {stimulus}, then photograph every {stimulus} that matches it

sequence of two swapped.humanReadableExplanation: Press {key_act} when you see a {a} {stimulus}, followed immediately by a {b} {stimulus}

stroop sequence of two.humanReadableExplanation: Now you will see the colour written over the {stimuli}. Ignore the colour of the {stimuli}, and only react to the word. Photograph every time you see {a} followed by {a}

stroop sequence of three swapped.humanReadableExplanation: Now you will see the colour written over the {stimuli}. Ignore the colour of the {stimuli}, and only react to the word. Photograph every time you see {a} followed by {b} followed by {c}

stroop branching.humanReadableExplanation: Now you will see the colour written over the {stimuli}. Ignore the colour of the {stimuli}, and only react to the word. Start by taking a picture of each {a} {stimuli}. But if you see a {b} {stimuli}, photograph that {b} {stimulus}, and from then on, only photograph {b} {stimulus}.

snakes seq of two.humanReadableExplanation: Press {key_act} when you see a {a} {stimulus}, followed immediately by a {b} {stimulus}

spiders seq of two.humanReadableExplanation: Press {key_act} when you see a {a} {stimulus}, followed immediately by a {b} {stimulus}

snakes not first.humanReadableExplanation: Photograph any {stimulus} that does not match the colour of the first {stimulus} you see

spiders not first.humanReadableExplanation: Photograph any {stimulus} that does not match the colour of the first {stimulus} you see

snakes branching.humanReadableExplanation: If the first {stimulus} colour you see is {a} then photograph every {b} {stimulus}. But if the first {stimulus} colour is not {a} then photograph every {c} {stimulus}

spiders branching.humanReadableExplanation: If the first {stimulus} colour you see is {a} then photograph every {b} {stimulus}. But if the first {stimulus} colour is not {a} then photograph every {c} {stimulus}

snakes ordinal branching.humanReadableExplanation: Skip the first {stimuli}. If the second {stimulus} colour you see is {a} then photograph every {b} {stimulus}. But if the second {stimulus} colour is not {a} then photograph every {c} {stimulus}
